structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Mode Of Acceptance Of Statute By Municipality Or District
law.text: Wherever a statute is to take effect upon its acceptance by a municipality or district, or is to be effective in municipalities or districts accepting its provisions, this acceptance shall be, except as otherwise provided in that statute, in a municipality, by vote of the legislative body, subject to the charter of the municipality, or, in a district, by vote of the district at a district meeting.
